attributes.action: Increase penalties for anyone involved in gun and knife related crimes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Adults and young people found in possession of guns or knives in public places or holding illegal firearms in their homes, should be placed on a register of risk which ensures rearrest and automatic imprisonment. 

New laws to be created that ensure long sentences similar to the 2 strike life sentence system, to ensure that high risk individuals i.e. those who use weapons to commit crimes, or carry them in public places can be adequately tracked, receive substantial sentences and are fully treated and educated whilst serving a full custodial sentence.

Stricter penalties for adults who 'groom', supply or encourage young people to become involved in the use of weapons in violent crimes.
